title: ‘The Gap is So Big to the Best Guys’: Can Giro d’Italia Breakaway Sensation Derek Gee Do it Again?
content:
The unknown Canadian burst into prominence with no less than seven breakaways in the 2023 Giro d'Italia: 'That left me hungry for more.'

Read the full article at ‘The Gap is So Big to the Best Guys’: Can Giro d’Italia Breakaway Sensation Derek Gee Do it Again? on Velo.
author: ahood
